item.title: GENERAL CANNABIS CORP 10-K
item.description: GENERAL CANNABIS CORP, which is in the Services-Detective, Guard & Armored Car Services [7381] industry, SEC 10-K filing on April 01, 2021 had 23890 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations.
